overview: NEC SPE, NEC METU follows upon Gutes Ende (Bliss) and Ich auch, auch, ich auch (Me too, too, me too), and it is the third film of Friedl vom Gr√∂ller to record visits to her mother in a nursing home. Like the life of her mother, the film itself is consumed by an involuntary force accelerating like a spiral heading toward the end.
title: NEC SPE, NEC METU
